page.title: 19The Hunt
page.content: competition.Children from our school entered handwriting,poetry and art competitions and were lucky enough to be awarded prizes. There were also farm machinery manufactures and fertilizer firms among the demonstrations. The show was very well attended.I liked the horse jumping.It was great and took up most of the day. {The Braes of Derwentside Hunt} The Braes of Derwentside Hunt ride regularly over the farmland in our block during the fox hunting season which is November to March.The Hunt has 65 meets per season and anyone can become a member of the hunt by paying Â£20.People follow the hounds on foot or by car.People who wish to ride to hounds must have their own horses, transport,proper hunting clothes and pay annual subscription.This year the
